org.dgfoundation.amp.newreports

Interface ReportArea

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReportVisitable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaginatedReportArea, PaginatedReportAreaForTests, PartialReportArea, ReportAreaForTests, ReportAreaImpl

    public interface ReportArea
extends ReportVisitable
    a generic structure describing an area of a report - be it a rectangular area (ColumnReportData) or a holder of subreports

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getOwner

        AreaOwner getOwner()
        returns the localized owner. For a row, it is the activity/pledge/whatever which owns the row. For a report subregion, it is the "splitter cell"
        Returns:

      • getContents

        java.util.Map<ReportOutputColumn,ReportCell> getContents()
        for a region, holds aggregates (trail cells). For a row, holds the values Since order matters, should (probably) be a LinkedHashMap
        Returns:

      • getChildren

        java.util.List<ReportArea> getChildren()
        returns the subareas, if any. Returns NULL if there are none (for example, a row)
        Returns:

      • getNrEntities

        int getNrEntities()
        the number of distinct entityIds (e.g. activityIds in AMP) in the subtree
        Returns:

      • accept

        default void accept(ReportVisitor visitor)
        accept a Report Visitor
        Specified by:
